title: K-513 Theology of Exile (1 of 2)
description: An examination of the biblical grounds for Israel’s previous exiles and dispersions into the nations in the purposes of God.  Art insists that the same conditions are existing for a yet future exile.  A 1994 message.

title: K-513 Theology of Exile (2 of 2)
description: An examination of the biblical grounds for Israel’s previous exiles and dispersions into the nations in the purposes of God.  Art insists that the same conditions are existing for a yet future exile.  A 1994 message.
